projects.name: Vehicle Detection and Tracking
projects.description: Collaborated on a vehicle detection and tracking system using Yolo V8 and Supervision which helped recognize traffic patterns and vehicle density with a 95% accuracy rate.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis ML Project for Product Reviews
projects.description: This project classifies product reviews as positive, negative, or neutral using machine learning with over 90% accuracy.

projects.name: Amazon E-commerce site
projects.description: This project replicates the core features of Amazon's e-commerce platform, including product listings, user accounts, and checkout processes, to demonstrate e-commerce development skills.

projects.name: Recommendation System
projects.description: Music and movie recommender systems using collaborative filtering on public datasets.

projects.name: QR code generator
projects.description: Engineered a user-friendly QR code generator that streamlined the process of creating codes for URLs and text; enhanced user experience led to a 40 % increase in engagement on digital marketing campaigns.

experiences.description: Internship program covering key AI concepts, including Azure ML, Azure CV, Azure NLP, with practical insights on using Microsoft Azure for AI solutions. Designed a highly accurate news categorization tool using NLP techniques, enabling real time classification of articles, with a throughput of over 1000 articles per hour. Used Open CV and Haar cascade algorithm to accurately detect face and eye with an accuracy of 97%. Implemented the Vision Transformer model for image classification by importing datasets, setting hyperparameters, applied data augmentation, created image patches, and developed the ViT classification model with an F1-score of 0.75. Created comprehensive visual reports using Power BI to track key performance indicators. Identifies key features in images through a process of data collection, preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and refinement.
